Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Cholecystokinin - octapeptide restored morphine - induced hippocampal long - term potentiation impairment in rats .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Hippocampal long-term potentiation impairment |
| Morphine-induced hippocampal long-term potentiation impairment |

Note: "Hippocampal long-term potentiation impairment" is a disease entity in the context of the paragraph, as it is mentioned as a negative effect of morphine and is being restored by cholecystokinin-octapeptide.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".
